website_summaries.verdict: Stands out for the extra waterproof rating, meaning you can swim in them.
pros: These meet the IPX8 waterproof standard, so they are great for swimming laps and other water activities
The short cord is convenient for clipping the music device close to the head
cons: Not Bluetooth enabled, so you must plug them into a device

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: The second time using the headphones the small piece where the earpiece attaches snapped off as I was gently inserting the earpieces into my ear. The same thing seems to have happened to at least one other reviewer (who also included photos). I decided to purchase them anyway with the hope that if I was careful of this potential failure point they would not break. Unfortunately these headphones are not durable enough to recommend, which is very disappointing considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic! Actually works in water when I swim laps
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Actually works in water when I swim laps, I tried 3 other brands, before I finally found these ones. I love listening to music when I swim, it makes the workout more interesting. These headphones hold up in slow, moderate, and fast swimming. This is technological genius. The only thing is they can't quite withstand flip-turns, but I'm going to try to clip them to my swim cap or suit strap and hopefully that'll help with flip-turns. Other than that they are amazing, with excellent sound and clarity in water. Love them. --Lorrie, San Antonio, Tx
customer_reviews.author: Lor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.text: I'd have to give these a low star rating. For $90 I was expecting something much more. The audio becomes almost inaudible as soon as you have the earbuds in your ear enough to try and keep out water (which they don't do a sufficient job of anyway) All we need from underwater earbuds is for the music to be clear, and to keep out water. Why is that so hard to ask? Just another product I'll have to spend time shipping back.
customer_reviews.author: Jamarryan

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: This is a total game changer for me. I wanted an in-ear speaker/ear plug that I could use in my Endless Pool. I am a highly motivated person, but swimming in one place, looking at the same spot on the bottom of my pool (with a touch of ADD), is pretty much impossible. I LOVE swimming and the workout it gives me, but I HAD to find a solution to my boredom. These earphones are GREAT, with great sound and comfort. I put together play lists for different times of workout, so I know just where I am in the workout and don't go insane. I love this. I look forward to my swim workouts now.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love These Headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Used the earbud type waterproof system before. These are a tremendous improvement. Flip turns don't affect them, they stay in place, and (bonus) keep the water out of my ears. I would recommend them to anyone who struggles with the earbuds. Definitely worth it.

customer_reviews.title: For $90 is definitely not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Item is flimsy and made of poor quality material. Purchase on 30 Jun and today July 11th I was replacing the earbuds and the connector where the ear piece goes broke in my hand. UPDATE: IF I COULD GIVE 0 STARS I WOULD. RECEIVED NEW HEADPHONES FROM AMAZON AND AS I AM SITTING AT THE LOCKER ROOM I GO TO REMOVE THE HEADPHONES FROM MY EARS AND THEY BREAK AGAIN. 2ND ONE IN LESS THAN ONE MONTH. NOT BUYING THIS GARBAGE AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Alcarez

customer_reviews.title: Time passes so much faster swimming laps!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing for swimming laps - No longer have to worry about boring lap after lap. They have an excellent set of ear fittings - normally I can't get the ear bud style headphones to stay in my ears. This was a first finding not only ones that did but they also keep the water locked out. The sound is great and I am using them with the "waterproofed" iPod Shuffle making it the perfect swim companion for lap after lap. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: bk

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I also have the audio player from Underwater Audio. I'm using the "FitGoo Earbud Insertion Helper" (petroleum jelly) along with these. Finally a solution to keeping the water out! A little may still get in, but just press the earbuds in, don't try to clean them and keep swimming. Comfortable to swim with, design keeps cords away from body and arms. Very expensive, but I would buy again. They just work for the intended purpose better than any other solution.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried it out of water, and it sounded great, then I tried one of the earbuds but when I was swimming my laps the sound kept going on and off on either side. I got worried that I'd have to return it right away. Then I went back home totally frustrated and tried all the earbuds in the different sizes. I finally found ones that seemed to fit the best and ever since then it's been perfect and no more sound going on and off. I also like how the ear buds stay on the posts tightly and don't come off in my ear canals.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L. Hilliard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent replacement for my old Underwater Audio headphones
customer_reviews.text: I was originally disappointed the headphones that came with my waterproof iPod were no longer available. I decided to spend way more money that I had originally and buy these. I am so glad I did! I currently am using them three times a week, for about an hour and fifteen minutes each time. I don't have any complaints, but am curious why so many different ear pieces are necessary. I am using the "tree" shaped ones that came attached to the headphones, and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Ictkaren

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I purchased the Finis Duo before and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I purchased the Finis Duo before and had to actually sent it back shortly after the purchase, because the product failed to charge. I got a new product by Finis, only to experience same issue after a while. One must constantly struggle with the charging adapter, for it to work, often without success. The Hydro Active Waterproof Headphones does not have this charging problem. Additionally, the overall sound is much clearer. It also gives a better base sound. Moreover, when swimming the sound is equal if your head is underwater or lifts up from the water. This is another advantage that it has over the Finis Duo. I find myself now swimming longer and enjoying the process better.
customer_reviews.author: Jairo G. Bloem

customer_reviews.title: broke before 1st pool use
customer_reviews.text: The little hard plastic piece broke the first time I went to change the earpiece. Talk about a piece of junk. I've used waterproof headphones before and have changed out countless earpieces over the years, never had one break
customer_reviews.author: Se

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for swimming laps
customer_reviews.text: These headphones do not slip down or get in the way as the long cord versions. I position the straps of my goggles around the headphones on my cap (one strap above and one below). The sound is good and since they come with 12 different types of ear buds you're sure to find one that works. I like the Ergo. I plug it in my Under Water Audio iPod shuffle and swim laps for an hour. NO problem with them coming out of my ears. Thanks for making this product. I have been using it 3 times a week for a month so far. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnmnc

customer_reviews.title: Great for use while swimming.
customer_reviews.text: This underwater headphone was a recommendation from a family relative who swims 2.5 hours three times a week. The product comes with a variety of ear pieces and sizes. The headphones work well while swimming laps. I have only recently returned to swimming since I cannot run in the 100+ degree weather. I do not do any in-water flips or diving. The headphones have worked very well for me, it just took some experimentation to find the ear piece that worked best for me.
customer_reviews.author: J. Black

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof earbuds EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I swim A LOT and have been through numerous waterproof earbuds over the past 10 years or so. These are Definitely The BEST I have ever seen or worn. The wide range of ear tips included is simply an excellent idea - so you can find the perfect fit for yourself and your specific use. Plus -- so importantly -- and the sound quality it outstanding. Once you pick the right fitting set of tips for Your Use (mine is long sessions of aggressive endurance swimming) they will even hold into your ear canals without a swimming cap ... I am going to tell every swimmer I know about this completely terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: WatchfulFriend

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I received the product only a few weeks ago and it is not long enough to give a thorough opinion on it. At the same time, the sound is good, the headphones are sitting well and I have no complaints Update for December 2019 After a year and a half the headphones stopped working and I had to order new headphones of the same type. Therefore, I lowered my rating from 5 stars to 3. We'll see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: yuri.p

customer_reviews.title: Music underwater.. amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have been a swimmer for over 40 years... both coached and swam. For the past 5 years I have been looking for underwater headphones and unsuccessful l until I found the hydro-active headphones. They are amazing. Short cord, headset stays in place and delivers great music. My swims are not absolutely wonderful. They may be a bit pricey but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Moyna

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I waited till I had this a week or two with doing laps several different sessions to review it. Wow! Finally a headphone set that doesn't cut out constantly. Worth the money. No other brand would keep the water out and those would cut out and get annoying having to try to adjust while swimming. If you are really wanting to have music while doing laps, this is worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love these head phones! I also really liked the hydromy pair I was previously using. However I think the hydroactives are even better and well worth the extra money if you plan on using them daily to s swim laps. Also I love the case they come with! Most important they come from a company called Underwater audio. The staff was so helpful and helped me choose the right headphones for my needs. They promptly answered my emails before and after purchase to offer assistance for both my purchases. Very very pleased! Makes your water fi even better!
customer_reviews.author: P. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for water
customer_reviews.text: Best headset for swimming ever! I’ve tried many headsets when swimming and, except for this one, the ear buds seem to fall out of my ear. On others the cords are too long. They include many different size/kinds of ear bud replacements also. It’s not as good out of water. I swim 6 days a week for an hour a day and I’ve had mine for 2 years. As I wrote, “best swimming headset ever!”
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Stange

customer_reviews.title: Some were better than others
customer_reviews.text: I have had several underwater earbuds down through the past few years. Some were better than others. I saw another swimmer at the pool using the HydroActive Headphones and he raved about them. I looked them up on Amazon and ordered them. They are better than anything I've used in the past.
customer_reviews.author: L A  Blackstone

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many waterproof headsets and these are by far the best and worth the money. I have been using these now for about the past two years or so and never once had a problem with sound.
customer_reviews.author: Monika H.

customer_reviews.title: The numerous ear buds are great but the head band is a hard plastic (looks ...
customer_reviews.text: The numerous ear buds are great but the head band is a hard plastic (looks like rubber coated wire but it's not) and does not sit well around the head. I bought these for swimming and getting the hard plastic to fit under the cap is doable but not great.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel R. Werner

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed in materials and design. Broke 2 time using
customer_reviews.text: I swim almost every day 1-1 1/2 miles a day. I have gone through several waterproof earbud styles. I purchased this wrap around style headset thinking that they would be more durable. BIG MISTAKE the small shaft that the silicone ear piece attaches to the headphone broke off. Terrible selection of materials and really poor design. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Scott S

customer_reviews.title: The HydroActive headphones are comfortable, good quality construction and give a very adequate ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had a water compatible ipod for some time. I finally found an underwater headphone that works! The HydroActive headphones are comfortable, good quality construction and give a very adequate sound. I can hear very well with them and even worry, not logically, whether other swimmers can hear the music. Is it theater room quality stereo, no, but that is not the purpose. I have been swimming longer lengths as the boredom factor has been significantly reduced.
customer_reviews.author: K. Geller

customer_reviews.title: HydroActive Waterproof Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these headphones! I really enjoy listening to music, and listening while swimming has been hit or miss for the last ten years; headphones sound great the first day, after the first day the quality quickly erodes. With the HydroActive Waterproof headphones, sound quality has remained very good. They continue to hold up. The head wrap/strap keeps the ear pieces in place and I do not even notice it is there. I also like the variety of in-ear pieces; I have use the large trees and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: plays, stays, and entertains
customer_reviews.text: Product stays in ears, never loosens and music can be heard clearly with every wave, splash, stroke and what ever else you do for exercise in water. Fantastic Product. !!!! a must have for that person who wants to take the mind on a journey while doing those repetitive laps.
customer_reviews.author: James Panto

customer_reviews.title: Finally I can swim hearing my music
customer_reviews.text: I swim for 40 minutes each day and it tends to be boring. With these water proof earphones I now can listen to my podcast while I swim and time just passes by. They also are good in not allowing water to get in my ear canal.
customer_reviews.author: luvspanties

customer_reviews.title: Consistantly fine sound quality without having to reposition during lap swimming.
customer_reviews.text: I've been through five waterproof headphones, and the HydroActives are the first that not only provide fine sound quality, but stay perfectly positioned in ear lobes. No longer do I have to reposition one or both ear plugs at the end of a lap because of water seepage affecting the crystal clear sound the iPod delivers. These remain in place for the duration of my workout with consistant quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: Houston L. Freeburg

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great company
customer_reviews.text: My headphones stopped working. The catch is you need to make sure they are dried out after your swim. I didn't do that so the headphones stayed waterlogged. I called the company and they were happy to send me a replacement pair. The headphones stay on for my flipturns and the sound is great. I am quite happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: fitnwell

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny!! I have tried other headphones and these by far are the absolute best. Was a little hesitant because of the cost, but I talked with their customer service and they assured me that if i didn't like for any reason, they would allow me to return them for a refund. I will never wear any other under water headphones. I lap swim 2500 yards 5 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Orvis

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, these are the best underwater headphones I have found, and I have tried several. My most recent purchase is actually my second set. The first set lasted about 7 months before the right channel began to fizzle out. The wire at the entry to the jack was shorting out. I had to keep fiddling with it to get a connection. Perhaps it got jostled around in my gym bag too often, not sure. That said, I loved them enough to buy another set. I will try to be more attentive to their handling and care.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: very clear sound
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I wouldn't like these when I got them, but they are really comfortable and very clear sound. I highly recommend them! Having music while swimming is such a great pleasure!
customer_reviews.author: C. DeMars

customer_reviews.title: Then remember round earbuds are best for water use
customer_reviews.text: When I plugged the headphones into my MP3 player I could hardly ear the music with volume turned all the way up. Then remember round earbuds are best for water use, I changed the buds and sound blasted. Pictured below. I just received them but have high hopes for them. All other earbuds I’ve purchased had static from first use.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: These headphones don't work at all.  As soon as I tried them only one side worked
customer_reviews.text: I was totally disappointed with these headphones and not worth the price at all. I would never buy them again. I haven't even tried in the water yet, and the headphones don't work - only one side is working and stereo goes in and out. They are also very uncomfortable. Can't imagine wearing them in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for lap swimming I have found yet
customer_reviews.text: Tried many cheaper waterproof headphones but so far these are the only ones that have stayed in my ears for an hour plus workout doing flip turns. Pricey but swimming with music is a game changer
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: Flipturns are possible
customer_reviews.text: I like you can do flip turns using this product. I think it will last longer than previous models as the chlorine eats the plastic covered wires over several months
customer_reviews.author: Lynn F.

customer_reviews.title: Quality has declined
customer_reviews.text: Since 2016 I have purchased 7 of these for myself and as gifts. In the past I gave it a 5 star review and recommended them in person countless times. Sadly I feel the quality has declined. The last two pair did not last as long. My last pair lasted only 8 months. They no longer come with a protective case even though the price is the same.
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: No more constantly putting the ear buds back in place!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the pool. I can attach my iPod shuffle to the side of the head piece where it stays. The head piece holds the ear buds firmly in place and the sound is great. I use it 6 day week, 52 weeks a year. I would recommend cleaning the ear buds periodically. I couldn't understand why mine wouldn't work. The ear buds were plugged.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Adler

customer_reviews.title: Perfect lap swimming headphones!
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit pricy but still by far the best underwater headphones I ever owned. I hope they hold up over time but so far they are great for my laps swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Blonde

customer_reviews.title: Music cuts in and out on either side. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not happy...Music cuts in and out constantly on either side. This was a problem from day one for me. Sometimes you can make it work by jiggling it around. Wish i would've read more comments before purchasing because it seems to be a common problem with these headphones. Giving 2 stars because it does sound good and stays in place if you can ever get both sides to play music.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertised!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Walkman previously- they do not compare to the quality of these. I used the tips that were already installed and they are great. The tips keep the water out so you can hear the music as clearly as above water. The headphones also are able to accommodate fact that my ear canals are not identical. I don't do flip turn but expect that these would work fine. Very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I live the freedom of wireless and answering the phone when I atm running. Turning off the set correctly is important tji retain battery time. But it is easy to charge, charge lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: bioprof

customer_reviews.title: Hydroactive headphones will change your workouts!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent audio quality underwater!!! The Hydroactive waterproof headphones stay in place on flip turns. You can load over 200 songs and many pod casts. This makes swimming laps a joy! The Hydroactive headphones are great for running, walking or deep water running in a pool. It's worth it to spend the money to get this package with the iPod shuffle. You will be very happy the first time you take them for a run or swim.
customer_reviews.author: Annie K. Chi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headphones
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing. It took me quite a few tries with the attachments to find the ones that worked. Once I found the right combination, my swims are so enjoyable. These are a little more expensive than most but the sound is so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: JGSC

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones. The sound is clear and good quality. I especially appreciate the multiple options for ear bud styles and sizes. I can now here my music whether I’m in the pool, or at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Great for listening while swimming
customer_reviews.text: Use these with a waterproof ipod for swimming. I like the rigid band around my head and the short cord - long enough but not so much as to get tangled or caught on my arm when swimming. Clear sound. Plenty of earbud styles to find one that fits well. Quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Just Right
customer_reviews.text: I use these earphones for swimming. I would like the extension cord to be shorter, or the main cord to be a bit longer. That is just for how I wear the phones.
customer_reviews.author: M. Papadolias

customer_reviews.title: They're great when they work until sound cuts off and they fall off your ears
customer_reviews.text: They're great when they work until sound cuts off and they fall off your ears. Hope they work for others though.
customer_reviews.author: Turtle/Bisugo

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and seal
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and seal. A host of different earbuds accompanied the earphones, but the originals fit perfectly. Music or audiobooks make the time fly!
customer_reviews.author: M.T.

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised sound great stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Sound great, really comfortable and they stay in place doing laps. Customer service has fast delivery, easy to get a response from and they stand by their products 100%
customer_reviews.author: SD Jaggalo

customer_reviews.title: It'll take a few swim sessions to try the different ear pieces and determine which one fits your ear the best. But after you fin
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these for swimming laps. Be patient at first, It'll take a few swim sessions to try the different ear pieces and determine which one fits your ear the best. But after you find your match, THESE ARE AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are certainly better than simple ear plugs
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are certainly better than simple ear plugs, however, they are inconsistent in hearing music. Maybe I am expecting too much for underwater headphones, but the music comes and goes and is indistinct. I certainly could not use these to listen to an audio book, I would miss over half of the words. I am experimenting with the various ear pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Hunsinger

customer_reviews.title: Great Audio Headset
customer_reviews.text: The head phones fit well the insert seal with help from the fit goo. The sound is clear and the does not interfere with your swim stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lind

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: the item has been received, the item is good and satisfied with the service
customer_reviews.author: INDOTOY

customer_reviews.title: The only GEAR i use when i am underwater
customer_reviews.text: after trying so many different underwater headsets, this was the best one...while I am swimming I dont have to worry about them falling out of my ears... The sound quality is amazing as well.
customer_reviews.author: roman

customer_reviews.title: Rapid Proof!
customer_reviews.text: I am a whitewater kayaker and tackle some of the biggest and most powerful rapids on the planet, and these headphones rock!!!! Music quality is amazing and never come out of my ears. I've gone through several types of waterproof earphones and none compare to these.....
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Lasts about a year
customer_reviews.text: Purchased on March 19, 2018 for recreational lap swimming. Failed (lost sound on one side) on February 15, 2019. Replaced under warranty. New pair failed (same problem) on 7/16/20. Not replaced as I was told the warranty dated back to the original 2018 purchase date. Two identical pairs of $90 headphones failing in two years. Not a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. Sound quality and volume much better than other swimming headphones. The multiple fit options are a huge bonus. Definitely a must buy for swimmers looking for new headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sacra

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: My first set the left side didn’t work. I contacted underwater audio and they had replaced them very quickly. I am so impressed with these. Lifetime buyer right here.
customer_reviews.author: danielle barrett

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Comes with a variety of replaceable ear adapters
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Comes with a variety of replaceable ear adapters, surprised to find one set of the exact swim earplugs I use. Place them on the headphones & best of both worlds- music & no water in ears- winning!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof headphones work well
customer_reviews.text: I paired these headphones with a waterproofed iPod shuffle, and the results are truly outstanding. I swim every day in the pool for 30 minutes, and the ability to listen to music while I swim really augments the experience. I clip the iPod to the side of the headphones, and it stays in place during my swim and remains totally unobtrusive throughout. There are more expensive options out there, but why pay more when this works so well?
customer_reviews.author: Grounded

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is good enough for spoken word podcasts
customer_reviews.text: They work well enough to earn 4 stars. They still leak occasionally, which ruins the sound until they dry out. Sound quality is not the best to start, but good enough for the spoken podcasts I usually listen to.
customer_reviews.author: BiffSoQuick

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second unit and I really enjoy listening to music while I’m swimming.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: together with their IPOD it works great and you can listen to a podcast or a ...
customer_reviews.text: See my review for iPod by same company. Bottom line, together with their IPOD it works great and you can listen to a podcast or a book.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: excellent sound underwater
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones allow you to stay underwater with remarkable sound. Very comfortable with a large variety of ear pieces so you can find the exact size and shape that works for you. Overall durability is good given the environment they work in. More than one person in our family have these and are very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: pwcdok

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! I have had the more traditional headphones that are on a cord which also worked well but feel these are more durable. The only change I have had to make to wear these headphones when compared to the cord headphones is to have to wear my ears exposed from my swim cap but otherwise, they are easy to use and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: So far these are the best pair I have used
customer_reviews.text: So far these are the best pair I have used, after purchasing several cheaper ones. Usually one side shorts out after a few swims. So far, so good with the Hydroactives. Take the time to try the different earbud tips to find one that seals well in your ear canals. Might be different on each ear! They stay in place well but the band around the neck is too large. It doesn't cause a problem but perhaps it could be smaller, or flexible/stretchy in a future redesign?
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones last December and was very happy with them for the three months I was able to use them until the virus shut down public pools. I just got back into the pool and after just a few swims the right speaker has gone out. Paying more than a dollar per use is not good value.
customer_reviews.author: Etta

customer_reviews.title: Very good swimming headphones.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several different brands of waterproof swimming headphones and these are definitely the best so far. They are not perfect because I'm not sure if a perfect seal could ever be made underwater, but yes I would recommend and buy them again. Worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: DA Pantoja

customer_reviews.title: The sound on these are great and they give you lots of ear piece sizes
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these are great and they give you lots of ear piece sizes. However, the ear pieces keep falling off and then I lose them and they're gone forever! UPDATE: The folks at Underwater Audio contacted me and are sending me a free set of ear pieces after having seen my posting. that kind of customer care deserves a ton of stars. Update from 4 to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: and these are the best I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing waterproof earphones for swimming for over 5 years now, and these are the best I have ever had. I was initially skeptical of the loop behind the head to hold the earphones in place, but it works great! I've swam 2500 yards several times now, with lots of flip turns and, other than an initial adjustment of the stock "pine tree" buds, I never have to adjust them during the workout. Great sound, and a really excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best so far
customer_reviews.text: Swim headphones are never perfect but this product, while expensive, is the best balance of design, fit, and ease of use. Tons of options for fitting you ears with various "tips" included -- just keep experimenting and you are likely to find one that works well for you.
customer_reviews.author: GPSig

customer_reviews.title: Sound you can really understand
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through many swimming headphones. This is the first one that truly delivers. They stay in place even after 1 hour of lap swims. The box comes with multiple adaptors to fit your specific ear. The sound comes out clearly. For the first time, I can listen to podcasts. Before, I would miss half of the dialogue. Now, it all makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: AlfaCharlie

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy swimming with these headphones. They’re comfortable and sound great, but after a few months the right earbud was no longer working properly. After some quick trouble shooting with customer service, it was determined that it in fact it was no longer working. Within a few days I had a brand new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Finally Waterproof Headphones that Work!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried others with limited success. This product is easily the best. Not distracting and good sound from the MP3 player. I highly recommend this product if you like music with your long indoor pool swims.
customer_reviews.author: VAJ

customer_reviews.title: The best waterproof headphones for swimmers
customer_reviews.text: These were the waterproof headphones I hoped existed. Unlike others that I've tried, these actually deliver consistent sound while swimming laps. They also come with many different earpieces to precisely fit your ears, and not just different sizes of the same cone. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Craig M.

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones!!!
customer_reviews.text: These babies are amazing! Terrific sound under water!!! Lots of ear buds to chose from too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard C. Dodson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and the fact that they stay on well when doing laps. I also like the different ear adapters. Try all the adapters to get a good seal and great sound. The sound quality is excellent. The case is very nice also, it has all the ear adapters included and a place for your Ipod and headphones. Great package.
customer_reviews.author: David Shanks

customer_reviews.title: The perfect accessory for swimming with music.
customer_reviews.text: I like the option of choosing the earbud that fits you best, it is nice to have several options. The wrap around design in my opinion is the best for swimming headphones. Definitely I am enjoying my laps sessions fully.
customer_reviews.author: Jose E. Reinoso

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit but broke after one use
customer_reviews.text: I thought long and hard before spending $90 on these headphones, but I bit the bullet and ordered them because I really wanted a better option than what I have been using. These do fit and stay on, and the multiple earpieces are helpful (thus my score of two stars instead of one). However, the right side quit working after one use. One use! A huge disappointment. I didn't want to deal with troubleshooting, because for $90, these should have lasted longer than one day. I shipped them back. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: njoy

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with the headphones it came with. Great customer service and got these upgraded for $20. Was happy it was easily replaced. Seems to be working great thus far. Very secure while I swim and easy to put on.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: If you are annoyed with: 1. Your earbuds falling out during your swim 2. Water in your ears 3. Poor sound quality I would recommend these. The only hassle is going through all the different ear buds to find which one works best for you. I've had these now for over a month and use them nearly daily. Great design.
customer_reviews.author: Marci

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it, I promise!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several of the cheaper headphones and lived to regret it. I've learned that sometimes, you get what you pay for! These aren't perfect 100 % of the time but they are pretty darn close. I've noticed that when I do flip turns the sound becomes muffled, however, as soon as I get to the surface, the sound returns. I'm a long distance swimmer so I really appreciate that I don't have to stop frequently to adjust or squeeze water out. If you are on the fence at all, learn from mistakes and just get these. It will save you a lot of heartache and frustration.
customer_reviews.author: beachbum

customer_reviews.title: ... 4 swims or so and then the sound turned horrible! Sounded like a tin can and was very ...
customer_reviews.text: They worked the first 4 swims or so and then the sound turned horrible! Sounded like a tin can and was very faint.....BAD....very BAD!! AVOID! Extremely disappointed -
customer_reviews.author: Justus

customer_reviews.title: It is a real blessing to be able to listen to Christian music while swimming
customer_reviews.text: Fits really good, no leaking of water into my ears. Sound is good
customer_reviews.author: T. Samson

customer_reviews.title: Love 💕 them.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and them some. Been using the product for three years.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: I have struggled to hear my music while swimming for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled to hear my music while swimming for 4 years now. I have tried many earphones. None worked well until I started using the HydroActive. They changed my swimming experience.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Howes

customer_reviews.title: They stay put when swimming laps and are very comfortable. The case is great and the many options ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving these headphones so far. They stay put when swimming laps and are very comfortable. The case is great and the many options for ear pieces is much appreciated. I have very small ear canal and have a hard time with mainstream headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: SAVE TIME SHOPPING AROUND!! BUY THESE - YOU WON'T REGRET IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I used the Hydroharmony that I purchased with the waterproof Ipod bundle, but after several months they stopped working. So I splurged and bought the HYDROACTIVES. These headphones are FAR SUPERIOR! Worth the extra $$!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Good deal - am 50 + and swim every day - these fit well and don't hurt under my swim cap (trying to hang on to what's left of my hair) - good price and quick arrival
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: These headphones are amazing. I use them for whitewater kayaking
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are amazing. I use them for whitewater kayaking. They completely keep out all the water. They work better than any ear plug I have ever used. I can finally stop getting ear infections!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Schule

customer_reviews.title: Great set of headphones and works perfectly with the waterproof ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set of headphones and works perfectly with the waterproof iPod! Loventhe case it comes in as wells. Protects it while in my gym bag. Wore out my first one. On my 2nd
customer_reviews.author: Karren Biernat

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: These waterproof headphones are awesome!! So far I swam with them three times and I can't believe these things work underwater and the sound is great. They come with different earbuds fitting so I obviously choose the ones the best suited me. So they are a great buy, also they came with a clear gel to help keep a seal to keep the water out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money
customer_reviews.text: I was in the pool for two hours today with these headphones on, and the music quality coming out of them was exceptional! It comes with a pouch that has a variety of different ear plugs inside, so according to your comfort/preference you are being provided with many options - excellent value for money. Thank you, couldn\t be happier! Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Ayse A

customer_reviews.title: Limited capacity
customer_reviews.text: I like the simplicity Problem is that the left side bud does not fit as well as the right, so often I only hear with my right ear Also the capacity is limited
customer_reviews.author: maurice druzin

customer_reviews.title: Great for lap swimmers who perform flipturns regularly
customer_reviews.text: Worked with underwater audio products and headphones in the past, these are definitely worth the cost for active swimmers. Great for lap swimmers who perform flipturns regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Garret Buehner

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: VERY POOR sound quality and the set isn't very loud as well.
customer_reviews.author: Damon R. sanders

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these underwater headphones after trying several others. Sound is excellent, fit of earphones is custom, because so manydifferent-sized eartios are included. Short cord is an inspired design feature...no pulling off headphones when swimming vigorously. I am an audiologist, so I know headphones.
customer_reviews.author: J.A.M.

customer_reviews.title: I hate swimming laps
customer_reviews.text: I hate swimming laps, well I used to hate it before I could do it to music! These headphones work and work well. They come with all sorts of different earplugs but I have even needed to fiddle with them because the ones they came with were a perfect fit. I have a lot of trouble finding headphones when out of the water so I'm picky. So glad I purchased these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: HydroActive Short-Cord Waterproof Headphones (Wired 3.5 mm Jack) with 11 Earbuds in 4 Styles
feature_bullets: HydroActive is a new generation of waterproof headphones that combine an extremely waterproof technique with the simplicity of a wrap-around band and 3.5 mm headphone jack
Best used for: swimming laps, SUP, kayaking, aqua-aerobics, canoeing and most other aquatic activities.
Outstanding Features: Easy to get on and off; wrap-around design doesn’t interfere with head gear
What’s New: Multiple protection chambers make this one of the most watertight of all headphones. Keeps sound clear and un-muffled

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars274 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
